summary: Scott Hall tells his life-story, from his rise to super-stardom in the world of professional wrestling to his downfall from it, due to alcohol abuse to his redemption to stay clean and reclaim his life and his family.
cast: Scott Hall|Bam Bam Bigelow|Michael Coulthard|Ted DiBiase|Mike Enos|Sid Eudy|Solofa Fatu Jr.|Howard Finkel|Bill Goldberg|Brian Harris|Earl Hebner|Bobby Heenan|Curt Hennig|Booker Huffman|Lash Huffman|Brian James|Jeff Jarrett|Chris Jericho|Dwayne Johnson|Jerry Lawler|Jim Manley|Rick Martel|Sherri Martel|Vince McMahon|Gorilla Monsoon|Matt Osborne|Nick Patrick|Walter Payton|David Penzer|P.J. Polaco|Dustin Rhodes|Tommy Rich|Juan Rivera|Jim Ross|Terri Runnels|Tony Schiavone|Scott Steiner|Mike Tenay|Robert Welch|Tim White|Mark Yeaton|Tom Zenk
keywords: professional wrestling|world championship wrestling|world wrestling federation|world wrestling entertainment|1980s
title: Scott Hall: Living on a Razor's Edge
